name: Cherubimon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may play 1 purple Tamer card from your trash without paying its memory cost. Then, for each Tamer you have in play, delete 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon. [On Deletion] For each Tamer you have in play, you may play 1 level 3 Digimon card from your trash without paying its memory cost.
